quotes.quote: If the lilacs bloomed earlier, it could mean we had a milder winter, so look out for potential insect outbreaks.
I cannot understand why my arm is not a lilac tree.
April is the cruelest month, breeding lilacs out of the dead land, mixing memory and desire, stirring dull roots with spring rain.
May: the lilacs are in bloom. Forget yourself.
Philosophy: a purple bullfinch in a lilac tree.

The smell of moist earth and lilacs hung in the air like wisps of the past and hints of the future.
